sentence.Network_en: With characteristic impetuosity, he announced he was leaving school.
sentence.Network_cn: 一贯性急冲动的他又宣布要退学了。

sentence.Network_en: Impetuosity will only make things worse.
Blind faith and impetuosity have led them into their present difficulties.
